UIDescription:
[color=YellowGreen][size=3]Description[/size][/color]

Molinari was made to aid the player in processing various items throughout the game.  
As an example; when you'd want to mill herbs, you would normally cast [url=http://wowhead.com/spell=51005]Milling[/url] and then click the item in your bags.  
With Molinari, you simply hold down the [i]Alt[/i] key and click the item directly.

The following spells/processes are supported:

[list][*][url=http://wowhead.com/spell=51005]Milling[/url] & [url=http://wowhead.com/item=114942]Draenic Mortar[/url]
[*][url=http://wowhead.com/spell=31252]Prospecting[/url]
[*][url=http://wowhead.com/spell=13262]Disenchanting[/url]
[*][url=http://wowhead.com/spell=1804]Lockpicking[/url]
[*][url=http://www.wowhead.com/items/name:key?filter=86;2;0]Skeleton keys[/url]
[*][url=http://www.wowhead.com/items/name:lock?filter=86;7;0]Jeweled keys[/url][/list]

In addition, Molinari also works for lockpicking in the trade window.

[color=YellowGreen][size=3]Feedback[/size][/color]

If you have a question, please use the comments section on Curse/WoWInterface.  
If you would like to report a bug or contribute to the project, please follow [url=https://github.com/p3lim-wow/Molinari/issues?q=]this link[/url] to get started.

[color=YellowGreen][size=3]Legal[/size][/color]

Please see the [url=https://github.com/p3lim-wow/Molinari/blob/master/LICENSE.txt]LICENSE[/url] file.
